title: Request Estoppel Certificate from Tenant
description: As part of a building sale, the owner's agent must collect estoppel certificates from all commercial tenants.

tasks.description: Identify all current tenants in the building being sold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all tenants.

tasks.description: Generate a blank estoppel certificate form and send it to each tenant for completion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the form to all tenants.

tasks.description: Track the return of the signed certificates and follow up with tenants who have not responded by the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all certificates are collected on time.
